definition: to share (let others have some of sth good)
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
old variant of 享[xiang3]

sentences.english: He told me that he had something grand to show meand share with me.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我说他有一样很棒的东西给我看，要与我分享。

sentences.english: This point is a related one to the financial advice Jason shares in his answer.
sentences.chinese: 这一点跟Jason分享的经融方面的建议有关。

sentences.english: The SafeHouse is a place for people of different faiths to share and support each other.
sentences.chinese: 是一个让来自不同信仰的人士分享及互相支持的天地。

sentences.english: Share your success with people, instead of pocketing it all.
sentences.chinese: 与人分享，而不要独守成功。

sentences.english: Walton will continue to split time with Radmanovic.
sentences.chinese: 沃顿将继续和拉德马诺维奇分享上场时间。

sentences.english: However, some help with chores and contributions to shared food are expected.
sentences.chinese: 然而，客人可以帮忙做些家务活，一起分享食物。

sentences.english: Shared laughter creates a bond of friendships.
sentences.chinese: 分享欢笑创造友谊的结合力。

sentences.english: Almost all share physical traits and mannerisms with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有孩子都分享他们的父母亲的身体特征和习性。

sentences.english: Online photo sharing website but based on your real-life social network.
sentences.chinese: 根据你的现实社会关系来在线分享照片网站。

sentences.english: Thanks to the many talented people who have shared their recipes with us.
sentences.chinese: 在此还要感谢曾经与我们分享这些原创食谱的天才们。

sentences.english: Alkenes have one or more double bonds between carbon atoms, where two pairs of electrons are shared.
sentences.chinese: 链烯有一个或多个共价键，即碳原子分享两对电子。

sentences.english: "Ubuntu" is an ancient African word that means "humanity to others".
sentences.chinese: “乌班图”是古非洲词语，意思是“与人分享”。

sentences.english: Do you share what God is doing in your life with your spouse, and visa-versa?
sentences.chinese: 你们彼此分享上帝在你们生命中的见证吗？

sentences.english: For others it is merely a way to share in a centuries-old tradition.
sentences.chinese: 对另外一些人而言，爆竹纯粹是分享一种悠久的传统。

sentences.english: Clinton and Mezvinsky share a special moment at the altar.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿和梅兹文斯基在圣坛分享这个特别的时刻。

definition: to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)

dried food (including dried fruits, mushrooms and seafoods such as shrimp and abalone)/(fig.) (coll.) knowledge presented in readily assimilable form/just what you want to know: no more, no less (no 水分[shui3 fen1])
server push (computing)
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
article/essay/literary works/writings/hidden meaning/CL:篇[pian1],段[duan4],頁|页[ye4]
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
to interact/interactive
friend/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
everyone/influential family/great expert
to exchange/exchange/communication/interaction/to have social contact (with sb)
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
Have a nice weekend!
